Introduction: ^"Hi, I'd like to book the next flight avaliable."
start: ^"Oh? We have a number that you could board is there somewhere specific?"
cheapest: ^"I'm looking to stay on budget so nothing too expensive, maybe go with the cheapest that isn't inside our country."
^"This seems like a good deal. They have a special tourist promotion."
^"Perfect! I'd like to be surprised when I show up to the gate, if you don't mind."
^"Sure, please drop your luggage off then head through security. Boarding at <color=#5B81FF>Gate 14</color>."
fastest: ^"I'm looking to get to wherever really quickly."
^"Oh, you might have a better chance staying in country then."
^"Quick-ish then... I don't want to spend most of my vacation getting to the location. Otherwise anything that looks good."
^"No don't tell me, let it be a surprise at the gate."
^"Okay... Please drop your luggage off then head through security. Boarding at <color=#5B81FF>Gate 14</color>."
anywhere: ^"Anywhere that looks good to you, randomly pick if needed."
^"Let me see... Do you have a VISA for any specific country?"
^"No... I didn't think about getting something like that."
^"I can work around it but I recommend looking into it in the future. Did you want me to tell you where?"
^"No thank you. I'd like to be surprised when I show up to the gate."
^"Please drop your luggage off then head through security. Boarding at <color=#5B81FF>Gate 14</color>."
